channel.title: Commerce on Ahimsauzi
channel.description: Recent content in Commerce on Ahimsauzi

item.title: Drupl Commerce Transitions
item.description:
Using the State Machine methods of the Drupal Commerce Order class we can transition order from one state to the next.

$order_state = $orderObj->getState();
$order_state_transitions = $order_state->getTransitions();
$order_state->applyTransition($order_state_transitions['complete']);

$orderObj->save();
